DOC.brief_summary: This prospective observational study examine level glucoregulatory hormone , special focus incretins level , critically ill patient stress hyperglycemia .
DOC.brief_title: Stress Hyperglycemia . Potential Role Incretin Analogs
DOC.criteria: Age > 18 year Emergent ICU admission Written inform consent patient relative . Previously know type I type II diabetes . Patients receive insulin oral antidiabetic agent ICU admission . Malignancies . Scheduled surgery Patients receive enteral parenteral nutrition . Inability obtain informed consent .
